issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] TestCastFunctions does not test int64 casting`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6002](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6002). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`outputs[2]` (corresponds to cast from float32) is checked twice https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4817/files#diff-2e911c4dcae01ea2d3ce200892a0179aR478 while `outputs[1]` is not checked (corresponds to cast from int64)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6002?focusedCommentId=16898742) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4991
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4991>
